weka.core.converters

Class HDFSSaver

  • java.lang.Object
    • weka.core.converters.AbstractSaver
      • weka.core.converters.HDFSSaver
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, CapabilitiesHandler, CapabilitiesIgnorer, CommandlineRunnable, BatchConverter, IncrementalConverter, Saver, EnvironmentHandler, OptionHandler, RevisionHandler

    public class HDFSSaver
extends AbstractSaver
implements IncrementalConverter, BatchConverter, OptionHandler, CapabilitiesHandler, EnvironmentHandler, CommandlineRunnable
    Saver for writing to HDFS. Delegates to a base saver for writing the actual file format.
    Version:
    $Revision: 11837 $
    Author:
    Mark Hall (mhall{[at]}pentaho{[dot]}com)
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
